name: I Haven't Lost Yet!
description:
Only playable if one of your characters is defeated this Round:
Create Omni Element ×1 and your current active character gains 1 Energy.
descriptionraw: Only playable if one of your characters is defeated this Round:\nCreate $[K411] ×1 and your current active character gains 1 $[K310].
descriptionreplaced: Only playable if one of your characters is defeated this Round:\nCreate <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1111}Omni Element</color> ×1 and your current active character gains 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1110}Energy</color>.
storytext: Arataki "He Might Lose but He'll Never Admit Defeatto" is always game for another round!
